cyclone.name: GORDON
cyclone.current_location: about 130 miles SSE of Mobile Alabama
cyclone.trajectory: tracking northwest toward the north-central Gulf Coast (Mississippi–Alabama border) and then turning north inland
cyclone.expected_landfall_location: north-central Gulf Coast near the Mississippi–Alabama border

weather_observation.watch_coast: Storm Surge Watch west of Shell Beach LA to the Mouth of the Mississippi River and east of Dauphin Island AL to Navarre FL; Hurricane Watch none; Tropical Storm Watch none.
weather_observation.warning_coast: Hurricane Warning Mouth of the Pearl River to the Alabama-Florida border; Tropical Storm Warning west of the Mouth of the Pearl River to Grand Isle LA and Alabama-Florida border to the Okaloosa-Walton County line; Storm Surge Warning Shell Beach LA to Dauphin Island AL.
weather_observation.impacted_coast: Louisiana, Mississippi, Alabama and western Florida Panhandle coasts within and east of the forecast landfall zone.
weather_observation.wind: No tropical-storm-force winds are forecast for PortMiami; only gentle to moderate breezes possible.
weather_observation.storm_surge: None expected at PortMiami due to the distant track well west of the Florida peninsula.
weather_observation.rainfall: Outer rainbands are confined to the western Florida Panhandle; significant rainfall is not expected in South Florida.
